title: How to Create a Talk Show on YouTube

steps.headline: Create a name.
steps.description: For example: The Different Show (check out this show on YouTube under the username Thedifferentshow77 or TheMakeupQueen13).

steps.headline: Figure out if you will be joined by co-hosts.
steps.description: Will you do it alone, or with friends? Make sure you treat co-hosts with respect.

steps.headline: Make your topics interesting.
steps.description: Don't blab on and on about something for the whole show (create skits; plays; cook interesting foods, etc.)

steps.headline: Advertise.
steps.description: You could tell people at school, post fliers up or put the link on your Facebook, or other social media outlets.

steps.headline: Make it pretty.
steps.description: Use Windows Movie Maker to edit out the bad and make it look good. No one wants to see you messing up or waiting for something to happen.

tyn: A pretty good Internet connection to upload your video
A computer with a movie editing software
text: Create a name. For example: The Different Show (check out this show on YouTube under the username Thedifferentshow77 or TheMakeupQueen13). Figure out if you will be joined by co-hosts. Will you do it alone, or with friends? Make sure you treat co-hosts with respect. Make your topics interesting. Don't blab on and on about something for the whole show (create skits; plays; cook interesting foods, etc.) Advertise. You could tell people at school, post fliers up or put the link on your Facebook, or other social media outlets. Make it pretty. Use Windows Movie Maker to edit out the bad and make it look good. No one wants to see you messing up or waiting for something to happen. Have fun with it!
sentences: For example: The Different Show (check out this show on YouTube under the username Thedifferentshow77 or TheMakeupQueen13).
Figure out if you will be joined by co-hosts.
Will you do it alone, or with friends?
Make sure you treat co-hosts with respect.
Don't blab on and on about something for the whole show (create skits; plays; cook interesting foods, etc.)
You could tell people at school, post fliers up or put the link on your Facebook, or other social media outlets.
Use Windows Movie Maker to edit out the bad and make it look good.
No one wants to see you messing up or waiting for something to happen.
